content: the end for step pictures with main color join a new strand of yarn in a stitch of r10 above the back fin insert hook and pull up a loop image 5 1 always picking up the next stitch towards the nose straight in line at the top of the body chain 1 1 half_double_crochet 1 slip_stitch chain 1 1 double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet in the same st 1 single_crochet fasten_off tie the tails together and hide them in the body optional embroider some cheeks under the eyes congratulations i hope you enjoy this quick little project don t forget to tag @allfromjade so i can see your makes thanks for your support @allfromjade 1 2 3 4 @allfromjade 5 @allfromjade
